title: The Summer of Last Resort
description: When the bullet-riddled body of a west coast crime boss turns up just outside of Santa Fe, the case is handed to detective Jake Sullivan and his partner Sandy McGregor. But things take an unexpected and dangerous turn when the diaries of three young lovers turn up among the evidence.For Maria, Kim, and Shane, the long, hot summer is the last chance for each of them – the last for Maria to have Shane for her own, and for Shane, it’s his last chance for Kim – or will Kim finally have Keith for her own – Keith, the tall, brooding, sexy young man that every girl wanted and every guy wanted to be?But then sometimes things just don’t work out quite the way people expect.
author: J.A. Browning
